name: WEN Token
description: $WEN is based on the popular "Wen" meme and is part of a new vision for WenMint to build a large community of innovators in Web 3. Backed by WenMint, one of the most well-known NFT launchpads in Web 3. It is the first memecoin launched in the US with a fully doxxed team and a commitment to maintain legal compliance. WenMint has launched over 200 NFT projects in the last two years while building a super super community comprised of over 50K holders. $WEN is a memecoin that also functions as the governance token for WEN DAO. The vision of WEN DAO is to introduce on-chain governance into an existing supercommunity and drive innovation in Web 3. Over the next few months, the focus is to bring up the governance structure, establish grant programs within the DAO, and drive innovation in the Web 3 space through decentralized collaboration. It is a memecoin that also serves as the governance token of WEN DAO. The DAO itself will be incentivized to drive the future direction and utility of $WEN.
